level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
"Appointment of agent" means a statement appointing an agent for service of process filed under ยง 29-104.11 by a nonqualified foreign entity or domestic nonfiling entity.
"Nonqualified foreign entity" means a foreign entity that is not a qualified foreign entity.
"Nonresident limited liability partnership statement" means a statement of:
Qualification of a domestic limited liability partnership that does not have an office in the District; or
Foreign qualification of a foreign limited liability partnership that does not have an office in the District.
"Registered agent filing" means:
The public organic record of a domestic filing entity;
A nonresident limited liability partnership statement;
A foreign registration statement filed pursuant to ยง 29-105.03; or
An appointment of a registered agent.
"Represented entity" means a:
Domestic filing entity;
Domestic or qualified foreign limited liability partnership that does not have an office in the District;
Qualified foreign entity;
Domestic or foreign unincorporated nonprofit association for which an appointment of an agent has been filed;
Domestic nonfiling entity for which an appointment of an agent has been filed; or
Nonqualified foreign entity for which an appointment of an agent has been filed.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
